title: Magna Carta Cartel - Goodmorning Restrained
description:
This debut album is a 11 track experience of what the band refers to as Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½soundtracks for movies yet unmadeÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½. With more than half the album being instrumental, the rest with vocals, it fits perfectly for all kinds of days: lonely times of wonder; thrashing a party, getting laid, hating your ex etc. This is a collection of songs with a lot of feeling to them. Or, as someone depicted the bands music: 

Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½Magna Carta Cartel plays as they say Ã¢â‚¬Å“Radio-edited movie themes, for daily life and deathÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½. 

Their music reminds of Vangelis meeting Tom Petty, trying to reach U2, willing to be Joy Division, feeling like ABBA, longing to be Brian Eno, remembering Jean Michel Jarre, looking at Metallica, sleeping with Mike Oldfield, dancing to Koto, hunting the Beatles, killing Morricone in a duel, snorting to Moroder etc.

01. That It Is Already Too Late To Leave 04.49
02. This Time 04.47
03. Sunsettlers 03.38
04. Attending Midnight Screen 04.12
05. Metropolis Flow 04.14
06. Deriving A Distance 04.28
07. Borderline Bordello 05.14
08. So Long 05.03
09. Valiant Visions Dawn 04.42
10. Dollhouse Decoration 07.34
11. Hotellus Eviction 08.01
